headline: Sandisk (SNDK) Has Become the Hottest Tech Stock to Pursue in 2026
summary: In only 11 trading days so far this year, Sandisk (SNDK) stock is up a blazing +70%, making the argument for the hottest tech stock to pursue in 2026.

headline: APLD vs. Sandisk: Which Data Infrastructure Stock is the Better Buy?
summary: SNDK's technology advantage and improving profitability contrast with Applied Digital's capital-intensive model. Storage leader benefits from the AI infrastructure wave.

headline: IPValue Affiliate Licenses Sandisk to Patent Portfolio Acquired from Cypress Semiconductor
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., January 19, 2026--IPValue Management, Inc. ("IPValue") today announced that it has granted Sandisk Corporation ("Sandisk") a worldwide, nonexclusive patent license to a patent portfolio held by IPValue’s affiliate Longitude Flash Memory Solutions, Ltd. ("LFMS") that originated from Cypress Semiconductor. IPValue and its affiliates concurrently granted licenses to other of its portfolios, and those agreements resolved all outstanding patent disputes between the parties.

headline: Sandisk (SNDK) Is Up 9.6% After AI-Fueled NAND Shortage Tightens SSD Supply - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent months, Sandisk has ridden an unprecedented shortage of NAND flash memory as AI and hyperscale data centers rapidly absorb available supply, allowing the company to raise prices on key enterprise SSD products while tightening its focus as a pure‑play flash specialist after the 2025 spin-off from Western Digital. headline: Memory Shortage Boosts Sandisk — and May Kill Personal Computers
summary: Sandisk split off from data storage firm Western Digital to list independently in February last year just in time for the boom.

headline: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
summary: Martin Luther King Jr. Day has arrived, bringing investors a day to digest a flurry of recent news items.  Is the Stock Market Open or Closed on Martin Luther King Jr. Day?  The New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq Stock Market will be closed on Monday.
